channel.title: CVE Feed for NI -- SystemLink Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NI -- SystemLink Server

item.title: CVE-2024-6122|2024-07-23T13:33:07.543Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: An incorrect permission in the installation directory for the shared NI SystemLink Server KeyValueDatabase service may result in information disclosure via local access. This affects NI SystemLink Server 2024 Q1 and prior versions. It also affects NI FlexLogger 2023 Q2 and prior versions which installed this shared service.

item.title: CVE-2024-1155|2024-07-05T17:20:58.903Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: Incorrect permissions in the installation directories for shared SystemLink Elixir based services may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-1155|2024-02-20T14:34:08.556Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: Incorrect permissions in the installation directories for shared SystemLink Elixir based services may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-1156|2024-02-20T14:37:07.095Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: Incorrect directory permissions for the shared NI RabbitMQ service may allow a local authenticated user to read RabbitMQ configuration information and potentially enable escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-6121|2024-07-22T19:46:11.685Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: An out-of-date version of Redis shipped with NI SystemLink Server is susceptible to multiple vulnerabilities, including CVE-2022-24834. This affects NI SystemLink Server 2024 Q1 and prior versions. It also affects NI FlexLogger 2023 Q2 and prior versions which installed this shared service.

item.title: CVE-2024-6122|2024-07-22T19:27:10.034Z -- ni -- systemlink%20server
item.description: An incorrect permission in the installation directory for the shared NI SystemLink Server KeyValueDatabase service may result in information disclosure via local access. This affects NI SystemLink Server 2024 Q1 and prior versions. It also affects NI FlexLogger 2023 Q2 and prior versions which installed this shared service.
